column1: #Text=The World Health Organization describes psychological , or mental , health as " a state of well-being in which the individual realizes his or her own abilities , can cope with the normal stresses of life , can work productively and fruitfully , and is able to make a contribution to his or her community .

#Text=Care for yourself like you care for others , by planning  playtime .

abstract[230]	new[230]	coref	70-1[282_230]

#Text=Good adult  playtime " activities include reading a book , talking to a friend , going for a walk , listening to music or walking .

column1: #Text=Add laughter and positive feedback by going out with friends or joining a book club or knitting bee .
#Text=Giving unselfishly to others can improve your quality of life .
#Text=You can feel even more satisfied with volunteer work than with paid work .
#Text=If you have the means to take care of an animal , you can benefit from the unconditional love and support a pet can give .
#Text=Studies have shown that making eye contact with your dog can release oxytocin , a mood-lifting brain chemical .
#Text=Consult a doctor or mental health professional immediately if you feel overwhelmed with anxiety or depression .
